B: If effect of the meal < 1.0, set it to 1.0
Else, if the meal is Hearty
Else, if the meal is Stamina related and is maxed out level wise (level 15 for Stamina Recovery, level 20 for Extra Stamina)
Else, if the meal is Stamina related and not maxed out level wise (level 15 for Stamina Recovery, level 20 for Extra Stamina)
Else, if the meal is maxed out level wise and is maxed out health recovery wise (160)
Else, if the meal is maxed out level wise and is not maxed out health recovery wise (160)
Else, if the meal is maxed out health recovery wise (160)
